author: David Hale
title: Belichick wins 1st at UNC, confirms Patriots ban
description: Bill Belichick picked up win No. 1 at North Carolina as it beat Charlotte, 20-3. He also confirmed that Patriots scouts have been banned from the UNC facility, saying, "It's obvious I'm not welcome at their facility, so they're not welcome at ours."
